name: Collision Line
description:
Android game on Google Play - full version, no ads, no iap

Fast, exciting game for in between. Draw lines on your screen which make the ball bounce off.

Move the ball to differently colored targets. Once the ball has the same color as the target it hits, you will be one step closer to winning!
If not, the ball becomes faster and faster. How much speed can you handle?

There will be more and more obstacles in your way, of course!
Though the increase in difficulty is moderate, starting with level 6 it might get a bit tough.
